This addon allows you to configure a Microsoft MCE remote, or any compatible remote using the eHome driver. The addon appears under the Programs heading on the Home page as "MCERemote".
The addon modifies the ReportMappingTable registry entry to configure the remote to send the standard MCE keypresses. See http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb189249.aspx for details.
The addon can also reset the ReportMappingTable registry entry to the default for a freshly installed MCE remote.

extension.summary: AWX - Ajax based Webinterface for XBMC
extension.description:
You can use this webinterface to control the Audio/Video-Section of XBMC: play/pause/stop/skip, show artists/albums/movies/tv shows and play them or add them to the playlist. It's designed for use on PCs or laptops with a browser like FireFox which supports JavaScript.
Minimum requirements: XBMC 10.0-beta3 (tested on Ubuntu Karmic Koala) Tested Browsers: - FireFox 3.6 (on Ubuntu Lucid Lynx and Windows XP) - Chromium 6.0.472.62 (on Ubuntu Lucid Lynx) - Opera 10.62 (on Ubuntu Lucid Lynx and Windows XP) - Safari 5.02 (on Windows XP) - Internet Explorer 8 (does not support round edges) Not supported: Internet Explorer 6
Hint: You may need to clear your browser-cache before you open the new installed/updated webinterface in your browser.
extension.summary: AWX - Ajax basiertes Webinterface fuer XBMC
extension.description:
Mit diesem Webinterface laesst sich die Audio- und Video-Sektion von XBMC steuern: play/pause/stop/skip, sowie Anzeigen/Abspielen von Interpreten/Alben/Filmen/Serien. Es wurde fuer den Einsatz an einem PC oder Laptop mit einem JavaScript-faehigen Browser wie FireFox entwickelt.
Mindestvoraussetzung: XBMC 10.0-beta3 (getestet mit Ubuntu Karmic Koala) Getestete Browser: - FireFox 3.6 (Ubuntu Lucid Lynx and Windows XP) - Chromium 6.0.472.62 (Ubuntu Lucid Lynx) - Opera 10.62 (Ubuntu Lucid Lynx and Windows XP) - Safari 5.02 (Windows XP) - Internet Explorer 8 (does not support round edges) Nicht unterstuetzt: Internet Explorer 6
Hinweis: Sie muessen Ihren Browser-Cache leeren bevor Sie das neu installierte/aktualisierte Webinterface in Ihrem Browser laden.

extension.summary: Home Row - Fast keystroke based web interface for XBMC
extension.description: Home Row focuses on speed by using a quick refine text field to filter items and then select them by hitting enter. You can use the up and down arrows to select items while focused on the field. It is also touch and mobile friendly. It has a hash based history system but doesn't support deep linking. It's entirely HTTP based so, it's easy to route and proxy pass. It should work with any browser that supports JS. If it looks funny or runs slow, get a better browser.

extension.summary: Gesture Remote Control for touch based webkit browser.
extension.description: wTouch give you to remote XBMC with your touch based webkit browser, like iOS and Android devices. It use your gestures by swiping fingers on your devices, so you will keep focus on your TV/Display rather than going back and forward between your TV/Display and your devices to find the exact buttons to be pressed/touch.

extension.summary: Browse releases on rlsbb.me and add links to JDownloader
extension.description: This plugin scrapes posts from rlsbb.me and presents them as directory items. By selecting a post the link gets added to JDownloader.

extension.summary: Play videos of different sports streaming sites
extension.description: Play videos of different sports streaming sites
xStream ist ein Plugin, welches mit eigene Plugins erweitern werden kann. Hiermit kann man Filme, Serien, etc per Stream schauen
Plugin to watch streams from various film, trailer, music and sport sites
